rules.sh:
// Show on all pages except the first page
return (Form.$Pages.currentPage && !Form.$Pages.currentPage.$isFirst);

// Show on all pages except the last page
return (Form.$Pages.currentPage && !Form.$Pages.currentPage.$isLast);

// Show on last page only
return (Form.$Pages.currentPage && Form.$Pages.currentPage.$isLast);
